author: JanFSchulte
body: The PointSeededTrackingRegionsProducer.h is updated with a correct fillDescription method to work in CMSSW 91X. Also, the possibility of using multiple eta-phi points to seed regions is added. Need for mitigation of the effect of non-functioning modules in the new pixel detector at HLT.
title: Update of PointSeededTrackingRegionsProducer to work in CMSSW 9
